course.subject: HUMA
course.name: Pre-modern China: The Song and Yuan Dynasties, 960-1368
course.description: This survey course is to study the continuity and change from the Song to Yuan Dynasties, 960-1368, from both global and China-centered perspectives. Topics include political institutions, Eurasian empire building, ecology and diseases, economy, culture and education, etc.

reviews.author: Eggtart
reviews.title: Good course, good instructor.
reviews.comment_teaching:
Instructor: Li, Chunyuan（上面打唔到）
上堂好似聽故事，老師講得很生動有趣，如果中學中史都係咁教我可能唔洗炒足三年lol，希望有機會再上佢堂，好正<3
reviews.comment_grading: Good grade. Essay(present) 同exam都可以預先準備，冇中史底都唔會比人屈機。
reviews.comment_workload:
一次3000字present（兩人一組），
一次2000字final exam（一星期前俾題目準備，可帶參考資料及大綱）
可能因為用中文所以冇想像中咁花時間，只係唔熟中史所以揾資料同理解題目要耐d
